post.content:
At a construction site in the USA, they found some copper after removing about 50+ feet of earth. So the Americans tell the world that it was them who invented the telephone moons ago (way before Alexander Graham Bell).

Russian immediately claimed they found some glasses at 100+ feet below at one of their construction sites. So it was them who invented fibre optics centuries ago.

A short while later, China News Agency announced they never did find any copper nor glass or anything in any of their construction site, so they are the true inventors of wireless communication eon ago.
post.title: Arrogant Americans
